nodes.text: The C-M Dead Bolt pistol was a prototype kinetic pistol produced by the Caelli-Merced Syndicate during the Galactic Civil War.

During 1 ABY, spacers who assisted either the Rebellion or the Empire during the Battle of Restuss and received commendations for their actions were able to requisition this rifle from a factionally aligned Commendation officer.

This pistol is one of the many items featured in Star Wars Galaxies as part of the Battle of Restuss story arc. Players received a commendation item for assisting their chosen faction, which could be stacked and traded for various items from Commendation Officer NPCs.
